articles.author: Lim Hui Jie
articles.title: Taiwan leads gains in Asia markets; Japan December inflation at its lowest since June 2022 - CNBC
articles.description: Japan's December headline inflation rate hit its lowest level since June 2022, cooling to 2.6% from 2.8% in November.
articles.content:
The Bank of Japan (BOJ) headquarters is seen beyond the cherry blossoms in Tokyo on March 20, 2023.
Taiwan led gains in major Asia-Pacific markets on Friday as chip stocks rose, with heavyweight Tai… [+1817 chars]

articles.author: Shashank Nair
articles.title: Uzbekistan show mirror to Indian football in a 3-0 rout in AFC Asian Cup 2024 - The Indian Express
articles.description: India next face Syria with an outside chance of qualifying for the Round of 16. It would require a win and a host of results to go in their favour.
articles.content: All it took was three minutes for Uzbekistan to take a pinprick and burst the balloon under which Indian football was operating going into this clash. There was an assumption that the toughest team i… [+3695 chars]
